panels.content:
linkerd enables service discovery, routing, and load balancing. Learn more »
Need help? Join us on the linkerd Slack.

targets.query: SELECT derivative(sum("success"), 10s)  / DERIVATIVE(SUM(requests),10s) FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT derivative(sum("requests"), 10s) FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(sum("4XX"), 10s) FROM "l5d:rt:client:status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(sum("5XX"), 10s) FROM "l5d:rt:client:status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(sum("success"), 1s)  / DERIVATIVE(SUM("requests"), 1s) FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("request_latency_ms_p95") FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT sum("request_latency_ms_p95") FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT sum("request_latency_ms_p95") FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(sum("success"), 1m)  / DERIVATIVE(SUM("requests"), 1m) FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE "client" =~ /^$service$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(sum("requests"), 1m) FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "client" fill(null)
SELECT sum("request_latency_ms_p95") FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT sum("request_latency_ms_p95") FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT sum("request_latency_ms_p95") FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(sum("success"), 1s)  / DERIVATIVE(SUM("requests"), 1s) FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("request_latency_ms_p95") FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT sum("request_latency_ms_p95") FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)
SELECT sum("request_latency_ms_p95") FROM "l5d:rt:client" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "client" fill(null)

list.name: router
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "l5d:rt:server" WITH KEY = "rt"

list.name: service
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "l5d:rt:client" WITH KEY = "client"

list.name: instance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "l5d:rt:server" WITH KEY = "host"
